results.title: Simvastatin attenuated rat thoracic aorta remodeling by decreasing ROCK2-mediated CyPA secretion and CD147-ERK1/2-cyclin pathway
results.text_hl: The results of the present study suggested that treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ attenuated thoracic @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Dissection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000784 @@@aorta remodeling@@@ without a significant lowering of blood pressure, indicating that the beneficial effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on thoracic @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Dissection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000784 @@@aorta remodeling@@@ involves other mechanisms likely not associated with blood pressure.

citations.NLM: Tang FC, Wang HY, Ma MM, Guan TW, Pan L, Yao DC, Chen YL, Li SJ, Yang H, Zhu XQ, Tu YS. Simvastatin attenuated rat thoracic aorta remodeling by decreasing ROCK2-mediated CyPA secretion and CD147-ERK1/2-cyclin pathway Mol Med Rep. 2017 Dec;16(6):8123-8129. PMID: 28983618
